phrases: I have two important announcements today.
First, I need to introduce a transfer student.
She is a foreign exchange student.
I am also an adventurer at one of the guilds.
I hope we can all be friends.
What is wrong with those boys?
I never thought she would end up in our class.
Then I guess you can sit next to Noir.
That is how these things work.
It is nice to see you again.
Hey, do not just pay attention to Noir!
He is already tight with Emma!
Now, here is the next announcement.
This might be a lot to take in for your first day in class,
but it has to do with the special lesson the rest of us had been discussing prior.
Apparently, it is a tradition at the Hero Academy.
And what is a training camp mean?
And if we are going on a vacation...
And then, the day of our training camp arrived.
I know hot springs sound fun and all,
but there will be monsters along the way.
Do you go to hot springs often, Leila?
This is my first time since coming here.
I am glad you could join us, Maria.
Yes, I am feeling just fine now.
Apparently, the hot spring we are visiting today is known to be great for your skin!
We used to take them together when we were little.
E-Emma, I know you are really excited,
but maybe you should not get in the hot spring.
I heard this hot spring's out in the open.
So that is what is going on.
We will need to keep our guard up.
I can sense their lust all the way over here.
Well, I guess it is okay if I am seen.
I figured you would stop anyone from peeking in, Noir.
I am sure Noir will protect us.
I see the girls trust you, Noir.
We are counting on you, Noir!
Uh, I do not know about this...
I want to get in the hot spring already!
We may be on vacation, but we will be training, too.
Your hubris and carelessness can lead to trouble.
I saw plenty of fools like you when I was a mercenary.
Of course, they never lasted long.
Extremely dangerous monsters live here on Mt. Amora.
Make sure you all figure out your lines and formations.
I am going to do my best not to interfere.
What are we supposed to do, exactly?
Since the boys are good at CQC, we will have them up front.
Most of the girls use magic, so we will support from behind.
I will be the rear guard.
You totally know what you are doing!
I go hunting monsters with my guildmates all the time.
She is got both wit and beauty.
And soon, we will see her...
It does not seem like any monsters are around, but what if there are traps somewhere?
I have the Trap Perception skill.
I just want to get to the hot spring,
but I doubt my troubles will end there.
I do not need a reason to help out my friends.
But who put a pitfall here?
The people who dug that hole are bad people called bandits.
I am not a bad monster.
Yeah, she does not look bad.
She is like a little fairy!
She is so little and cute!
I am pretty sure pixies trick humans...
That Monster Puppetry skill is a bit concerning.
Guess this is all up to us students.
You are all headed to the hot spring, are not you?
We want to get there fast!
I guess some monsters can be good.
We can finally get in the hot spring!
It is just about a five-minute walk to the hot spring.
It is pretty dark in here, and the formation we came up with is shot now.
If it seems dangerous, we can turn back.
And I can detect traps, remember?
Why did you draw your sword?
I am a bit of a coward.
I think something might be hiding in them.
If there were any monsters, I would get attacked.
True, but you have the Monster Puppetry skill.
You are using that skill to control some monsters
so they will ambush us, right?
I guess there is no point in hiding it anymore!
We just need to regroup, get back into formation,
and deal with them one by
We are definitely going to peek...
Do not get in our way!
You guys want to peek that badly?!
You are not going to stand between me and my hot spring!
This hot spring must be something else...
Th-This was not supposed to happen...
H-Humans are all ugly and stupid!
There are monsters that try to act innocent to lure you into traps,
so you need to be careful
I want to wash all my sweat off.
Like any of you are listening.
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter!
You must be from the Hero Academy.
The bathing times are designated and split between the men and the women.
It is currently open only for our lady guests.
I would love to wash off all this sweat immediately, but...
We may be rotten, but we are still students of the Hero Academy.
Therefore, we would never ever do something so wrong
This must be thanks to the fact that we defeated those monsters together!
I am so glad they changed their min
You guys want to go see some naked girls?!
Burn that sight into your eyes!
I am the one who proposed a plan to nurture these young men,
and I shall also act as your leader.
we must do everything we can to avoid being labeled peeping toms!
That is why we are using these!
We are counting on you, Noir!
Hey, did you see the bath?
Head right into the women's bath!
I-I have to stop them somehow!
I never thought you would be the one, Noir...
If you thought you could sneak a peek, you have got another thing coming.
I am trying to stop the other boys, too!
I am afraid your words are not enough.
I am going to rake you across the coals.
I guess you all want more punishment.
I do not want any meaningless bloodshed.
Do not get in the way of the villainous organization Dark Sword.
Did not you say something about a plan to nurture young men earlier?
I have no idea what you are talking about.
I guess it is futile now.
Noir, I will take care of things here.
Even you cannot stop me right now, Ms. Elna!
So I will let this slide.
You are more powerful than usual.
You did something, did not you?
It is all so I can see the girls in our class naked!
I collected tons of magical potions and items to make myself more muscular!
I used my whole life savings!
Your stupidity is on another level.
You did all that just to see your classmates naked?
I get excited because they are my classmates!
True lewdness is best when it is within reach!
I would risk my life for that, you asswipe!
W-We can clearly see you are passionate about this,
but I think there is a line you should not cross.
This is what guys dream about.
I mean, I get it... I am a guy, too.
You want to see them, too, do not you?
He is got a point, but...
I cannot hurt any girls' feelings over our selfish desires!
Cheating to get a peek is despicable!
Hjorth has powered up his muscles to their limits.
This is a fight over a true man's conviction!
I will get to the women's bath no matter what!
The one who has stronger ideals will always win the battle!
I guess that is all you have got.
I am going to get a good eyeful of Emma naked.
I will Get Creative and make the Powerless skill...
Get Creative, make, and Bestow to Hjorth
going to lose in this battle of determination!
Looks like it is all over.
I got to witness your true determination.
Our short and unnoticeable speedster, Kent!
I will make sure to write a report about my findings!
I will be right there, girls!
Maybe I can Bestow Heavy on him...
Get Creative, make, and Bestow to Kent
I guess it costs more to affect skills they are good at.
I will only have 200 LP left if I do that.
I would be risking my life, but...
I am going to get an eyeful!
I am going to stop him!
Get Creative, make, and Bestow to Kent
He just will not give up!
Get out of the bath right now!
I thought you were going to take a bath.
We got undressed and were about to...
But then Ms. Elna told us to hold off.
S-So she managed to stop you...
Looks like you kept your promise.
Thanks to you, they did not fall victim to the boys' evil schemes.
I-I used up too much LP...
Do not remove the towel on your eyes or your waist.
I trapped the boys in their room.
It is all thanks to you that we were able to stop the boys from peeping,
so as a reward, you can bathe with us.
I-I get to bathe with you?
You fought for the girls, so I will allow that much.
Ah, so this is how your muscles look.
A-Are they enjoying a helpless guy?
Noir, you do not have enough LP, right?
What is that you are pressing against my face?
I guess I will use these instead of my ass this time.
These seem softer than last time!
This is quite a thrilling sight.
I am a girl, and I am still getting jealous.
I-Is this what this school's always like?
My LP easily surpassed 10,000 that night.
